text: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists! (released overseas as The Pirates! Band of Misfits) is a 2012 British-American-Canadian adult animated television series created by British character designer and animator Rob Stevenson. 52 episodes were produced. The show was directed and produced by Rob Stevenson and animated by Rough Draft Korea in Seoul, South Korea. The music for the series was composed by Jody Gray, Andy Ezrin and John Scott. A theatrical feature-length film directly based on the series titled The Boys!: In an Adventure with Scientists: The Movie was later released in 2015. title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!
